thread.title: The Season's Glitziest Party Dressing, Shot in Naples - WSJ.com

author: Photography Christian Macdonald
title: The Season's Glitziest Party Dressing, Shot in Naples - WSJ.com
text: The Season's Glitziest Party Dressing, Shot in Naples Escape to the entrancing Tyrrhenian seaside, where dramatic dresses sparkle in a cinematic setting Photography by Christian Macdonald; Styling by George Cortina Scroll SWEPT AWAY Bask in a sun-soaked boat ride. Calvin Klein 205W39NYC dress, $6,500, 654 Madison Avenue, New York, Annina Vogel necklaces, $485–$1,734, libertylondon​.com, Eye M by Ileana Makri earring, $505 for a pair, eye-m-ileanamakri​.com, Roberto Coin earring, $1,650 for a pair, neimanmarcus​.com Photography by Christian Macdonald; Styling by George Cortina WANDERLUST Stand out from the crowd in elegant eveningwear. Saint Laurent by Anthony Vaccarello dress, $7,900, Saint Laurent, 3 East 57th Street, New York, and Roberto Coin earring, $1,650 for a pair, neimanmarcus​.com Photography by Christian Macdonald; Styling by George Cortina Versace jacket (worn as dress), $3,250, select Versace stores, Anine Bing bra, $99, aninebing​.com, Falke tights, $28, falke​.com, Annina Vogel necklaces, $485–$1,734, libertylondon​.com, Eye M by Ileana Makri earring, $505 for a pair, eye-m-ileanamakri​.com, Roberto Coin earring, $1,650 for a pair, neimanmarcus​.com, and Gianvito Rossi shoe, $820, Gianvito Rossi, 963 Madison Avenue, New York. Photography by Christian Macdonald; Styling by George Cortina STRIKING POISE Night or day, choose a sultry style. Marc Jacobs dress, $15,000, Marc Jacobs stores, Falke tights, $28, falke​.com, Annina Vogel necklaces, $485–$1,734, libertylondon​.com, and Roberto Coin earring, $1,650 for a pair, neimanmarcus​.com. Photography by Christian Macdonald; Styling by George Cortina Valentino dress, $4,950, Valentino, 212-355-5811, Falke tights, $28, falke​.com, Annina Vogel necklaces, $485–$1,734, libertylondon​.com, and Roberto Coin earring, $1,650 for a pair, neimanmarcus​.com. Photography by Christian Macdonald; Styling by George Cortina ABOVE ALL Bare a sliver of skin for maximum impact. Balenciaga dress, $2,290, Balenciaga, 840 Madison Avenue, New York, Annina Vogel necklaces, $485–$1,734, libertylondon​.com, Photography by Christian Macdonald; Styling by George Cortina Louis Vuitton dress, price upon request, select Louis Vuitton stores, Falke tights, $28, falke​.com, Annina Vogel necklaces, $485–$1,734, libertylondon​.com, and Roberto Coin earring, $1,650 for a pair, neimanmarcus​.com. Photography by Christian Macdonald; Styling by George Cortina AFTER HOURS Twinkle into twilight with embellished pieces. Dries Van Noten pink top, $1,175, rust top, $880, and briefs, $355, barneys​.com, Falke tights, $28, falke​.com, Roberto Coin earring (at left), $1,650 for a pair, neimanmarcus​.com, Balenciaga earring (at right), $895 for a pair, Kokko, 1-604-278-5787 and Gianvito Rossi shoe, $820, Gianvito Rossi, 963 Madison Avenue, New York. Photography by Christian Macdonald; Styling by George Cortina Céline dress, price upon request, similar styles available at Saks Fifth Avenue, New York, Falke tights, $28, falke​.com, Annina Vogel necklaces, $485–$1,734, libertylondon​.com, Eye M by Ileana Makri earring (at left), $505 for a pair, eye-m-ileanamakri​.com, Roberto Coin earring (at right), $1,650 for a pair, neimanmarcus​.com and and Gianvito Rossi shoe, $820, Gianvito Rossi, 963 Madison Avenue, New York. Photography by Christian Macdonald; Styling by George Cortina LOVE STORY Sequins and fringe ignite ardor. Gucci bodysuit, $4,600, select Gucci stores nationwide, Falke tights, $28, falke​.com, Annina Vogel necklaces, $485–$1,734, libertylondon​.com, Eye M by Ileana Makri earring (at left), $505 for a pair, eye-m-ileanamakri​.com and Roberto Coin earring (at right), $1,650 for a pair, neimanmarcus​.com Photography by Christian Macdonald; Styling by George Cortina The Row dress, $3,690, The Row, 17 East 71st Street, New York, Maison Margiela designed by John Galliano feather T-shirt, $2,095, Maison Margiela boutiques nationwide, Azzedine Alaïa belt, price and availability upon request, boutique.moussy@alaia.fr, Annina Vogel necklaces, $485–$1,734, libertylondon​.com, Roberto Coin earring, $1,650 for a pair, neimanmarcus​.com. Photography by Christian Macdonald; Styling by George Cortina Paco Rabanne jumpsuit, $2,950, barneys​.com, Annina Vogel necklaces, $485–$1,734, libertylondon​.com, Eye M by Ileana Makri earring, $505 for a pair, eye-m-ileanamakri​.com, Roberto Coin earring, $1,650 for a pair, neimanmarcus​.com, Falke tights, $28, falke​.com, Gianvito Rossi shoes, $820, Gianvito Rossi shoe, $820, Gianvito Rossi, 963 Madison Avenue, New York and vintage trench, $385, Stock Vintage, 143 East 13th Street, New York. Model, Freja Beha at IMG Models; hair, Christiaan; makeup, Kanako Takase; manicure, Alessandra. Photography by Christian Macdonald; Styling by George Cortina Advertisement
